bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Installation Design and Installation of Valve-Regulated Lead-Acid Storage Batteries for Stationary Applications
IEEE Recommended Practice for Installation Design and Installation of Valve-Regulated Lead-Acid Storage Batteries for Stationary Applications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This IEEE standard covers recommended design practices and procedures for storage, location, mounting, ventilation, instrumentation, preassembly, assembly, and charging of valve-regulated lead-acid (VRLA) storage batteries. Recommended safety practices are also included. This recommended practice applies to all VRLA battery stationary installations.
